title: Syria: UK and France airstrikes hit underground IS arms bunker near Palmyra
description: RAF Typhoon jets joined French aircraft in a strike on an Islamic State group arms store in Syria, UK officials say.
content:
Royal Air Force Typhoon jets have joined French aircraft in a joint strike on an underground arms cache in Syria used by the Islamic State group (IS), the UK Ministry of Defence says.
"Careful" intelligence analysis led officials to believe the facil... [1668 chars]

title: British and French aircraft attack underground Islamic State weapons store in Syria
description: Guided bombs used to target tunnels at site near to ancient city of Palmyra in raid intended to ‘eliminate dangerous terrorists’
content:
British and French aircraft have carried out a joint strike on an underground facility in Syria that had been occupied by Islamic State, the UK Ministry of Defence has said.
Guided bombs were used to target access tunnels to the site, in the mountain... [710 chars]

title: Beckham family feud continues as Nicola Peltz snubs David and Victoria in New Year post
description: It comes after her husband Brooklyn, the eldest of the Beckham children, reportedly declared his relationship with his parents is 'over' on New Years Eve
content:
The eldest Beckham son and his wife remain locked in a feud with the rest of his family, which resulted in both David and Victoria blocked on Instagram last month.

title: Tim Spector: Weight-loss jabs are fine… if we stop eating junk
description: The nutrition expert says that while millions are using drugs like Ozempic to lose weight, the importance of a healthy diet is being neglected
content: But Spector is concerned that the NHS and the government are failing to educate patients on nutrition. In Britain, 57 per cent of daily energy intake derives from ultra-processed foods (UPFs), and an even higher proportion (66 per cent) for adolescen... [4560 chars]
